mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOODORDER(ORDERNUMBER, MEMBERID, MEMBERNAME, MEMBERTEL, MEMBERADDRESS, PRICE, ORDERINFO, MENUNAME, AMOUNT, STORENAME, STOREADDRESS, STORETEL, ORDERTIME, STATE, HIT) VALUES(#{ordernumber},#{memberid},#{membername},#{membertel},#{memberaddress}, #{price},#{orderinfo},#{menuname},#{amount},#{storename}, #{storeaddress},#{storetel},#{ordertime},'승인대기',0)
